data.hoverText: 可与单数或复数动词连用的可数名词

data.enText: a large group of soldiers that is commanded by a colonel
a large number of people or things

word_means: 把…编成团；使受组织训练；组织化

means: 把…编成团；使(职工,劳动者等)受组织训练；组织化

tr: army unit smaller than a division
subject to rigid discipline, order, and systematization

value.def: A regiment is a large group of soldiers that is commanded by a colonel.
A regiment of people is a large number of them.

example.ex: ...robust food, good enough to satisfy a regiment of hungry customers.
example.tran: 可以满足一大批饥饿的顾客的高能量食品
